Public Remarks: Walk across the street to Fashion Square Mall or a short distance to Old Town Scottsdale with shopping, dining, and nightlife. This is a ground floor condo, no steps. Pack a suitcase and move in! Furniture, appliances, dishes, linens everything included. Couch is a sofa bed. Sleeps 4. This is a great investment for someone wanting to add to their income or the young professional starting a career in a hot neighborhood. The condo has updated flooring and many amenities. Buyer is to to due diligence and verify all facts. See it soon!
Directions: NORTH ON 68TH STREET, NORTH TO CAMELBACK HOUSE.

Public Remarks: Beautiful second floor unit with no upstairs neighbors and balcony views of Camelback Mountain. Conveniently located across the street from Fashion Square Mall and within walking distance to old town Scottsdale. This unit is move in ready with updates including updated flooring and a bathroom with tiled shower. Make this your winter getaway or a fantastic vacation rental in the heart of Scottsdale. This complex allows short-term rentals, per HOA, and features four pools, multiple BBQ's, lush grounds and laundry facilities.
Directions: Camelback Rd to N 68th Street, continue North until the last entrance on your Left into Camelback House parking lot.

Public Remarks: Great buy! This can be yours!  Motivated seller! Location! This remodeled condo is in a prime location.  Walk across the street to Fashion Square Mall, enjoy the food, stores, and night life in Old Town Scottsdale.  Golf is .5 miles away.  Enjoy sitting on the patio, a swim in the heated pool.  This condo has new stainless steel appliances, new hot water heater, wood plank flooring.  Whether you want a winter home, a starter home or an investor looking for an AIRBNB this property is it.  Complex is starting a large upgrade project this year, including roofs, stairways, painting, etc.  Do not miss the opportunity to see this beauty!
Directions: From Camelback go North on 68th street, turn into Camelback House parking lot.  Drive to back Wall.  Second building from the North Side.

Public Remarks: Experience Luxury Living at Camelback House!  Welcome to a stunning turn-key condo that perfectly encapsulates luxury and style. This residence has been meticulously remodeled from top to bottom. Washer Dryer may be added inside unit! Whether you're an investor or simply seeking a lavish lifestyle, this property has something to offer everyone.  An Investor's Dream! Top-rated Airbnb destination. It is income-generating and comes available fully furnished, making it a seamless addition to any property portfolio. The location and amenities make it attractive to both short-term renters and long-term residents.  Prime Location Situated in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale, this condo provides unparalleled access to one of the most vibrant areas in Arizona. Walkthrough Video!
Directions: From Camelback and 68th St, go north on 68th Street to Camelback House on the west side of the street. Enter the development and take the first driveway on right and go to unit #472 .

Public Remarks: Stunning Second Floor Condo in the Heart of Scottsdale! Beautifully remodeled condo that offers a captivating view of one of the community's four heated pools. Located just steps away from Fashion Square Mall, you'll enjoy easy access to an array of shopping, dining, and entertainment options.  This prime property is situated near the vibrant Old Town Scottsdale and golf courses, making it an ideal choice for a starter home, vacation retreat, or a lucrative AIRBNB opportunity. Don't miss your chance to own a piece of Scottsdale living, where comfort meets convenience!
Directions: Camelback Road West to 68th Street, North to Camelback House on the West side of the street.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this fully remodeled (2020) gem in the highly desirable Camelback House community! This stylish 1 bed, 1 bath condo offers modern finishes throughout, including updated flooring, cabinetry, and fixtures. Enjoy a bright, open living space just steps from the heart of Old Town Scottsdale?dining, shopping, and entertainment are right at your doorstep. Community amenities include pools, lush landscaping, and ample parking. Furnishings available on a separate bill of sale?just bring your suitcase and move in!
